40247.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「パクレのせいで:
I can't steal because of Pakul, I'm stressed out, and I'm angry. I want to hit him. I want to hit anyone. I'm thinking about Pakul and
I'm getting angry. I'm in a bad mood. I don't want to be with Pakul. Seriously.

40248.「あー。オイラ 腹へったなー。\n おいしいケーキとか いっぱい食べたいなー。\:
I'm hungry. I want to eat lots of delicious cakes and stuff. But I don't want to go to Orphea, and I don't want to play chase with
Inspector Pakul. I think it's better if I don't move.

40249.「ボクたちは ダンダダ団っていう盗賊団さ。\n バロのアニキが リーダーで\n:
We are the Robbin' Ood Gang. Baro's brother is the leader, and I and Borao are his henchmen. We are actually a gang of thieves who enjoy
stealing freely, but right now we are being watched by Inspector Pakul of the Town of Orphea. They can't steal. If I try to steal,
he comes after me with a true red face. Inspector Pakul is a real pain in the ass.

40250.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「来たぜ。ていう:
I'm here. I mean, it's here. My time has come. Seriously. Pakul is gone. He's a tough guy. Oh, man. I'm feeling too happy. I want to go
steal something for the first time in a long time. Seriously. I want to steal a Fostail Statue or something. I mean, I'm going to
steal it, but you'll cooperate, right? If I cooperate, I might even give you a big thank you. Seriously. I'm going to Fostail Square in
Muruel Forest. You can be my bodyguard or something. You seem strong. Let's do it. Let's do it.

40251.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「だよな。ていう:
I know, right? I mean, I don't even have to ask. There's no way you'd refuse my request. But I'll tell you what I know. Thank you. I
have a delicate body, so I really don't want to be a monster or anything like that. So you go first. Seriously. We'll sneak along behind
you without being noticed by the monsters. I'm counting on you. Hey.

40252.「……ていうか お前。他の連中の頼みごとを\n 抱え込みすぎだろ？ やべえ。あり:
I mean, you. You're doing too many favors for the others, aren't you? Oh, man. That's impossible. Your no-hoper attitude is godlike.
But I have a big heart, so I'll wait until you finish your work. Oh, man. I'm too handsome at heart.

40253.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「やべえ。断っち:
Oh, no. I turned him down. I was really motivated, but now my mood has dropped. I'm depressed. I mean, I'm stressed out. I want to
punch him. I want to hit anyone. But I'm so cool to be patient.

40254.「あー。オイラ 腹へったなー。\n ひさびさに オルフェアに行って\n おいしい:
I'm so hungry. I want to go to Orphea for a
long time and eat lots of delicious cakes.

40255.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「へへへ。聞いて:
Heh heh. Listen, listen. I just found out the scoop. I was walking down Silver Hill when I heard a voice through the weird door. Someone
was locked in the door. Heh heh heh. I couldn't work as much as I wanted because Inspector Pakul was moving around, but now I
can steal as much as I want.

40256.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「オレさ こう見:
I have a delicate body, so I really don't want to be a monster or anything like that. So you go first. Seriously. My plan is to steal the
statue in Fostail Square in Muruel Forest. You'll lead the way.

40257.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「オレたち 魔物:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>We'll follow you stealthily without being
noticed by the monster. I'm counting on you.
Hi.

40258.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「やべえ……。オレの:
Oh, man. My back is screaming. There is a big possibility that this will be the end of my thief life. I mean, I'm depressed. Seriously.
This is for my protection. I'm giving it to you. I'm famous for keeping my promises. Seriously. Take it. I'll hit you if you don't.

40259.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「うぐぐ……。パクレ:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>Ugggghh...Pakul is gone and I can't go
outside...my tragedy...too much God.... I've
learned to appreciate my waist. Seriously.

40260.「あー。オイラ 腹へったなー。\n おいしいケーキとか いっぱい食べたいなー。\:
I'm hungry. I want to eat lots of delicious
cakes. I'll get some for you later.

40261.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「バロのアニキは ギ:
Barro's brother seems to have a bad back. He can't go stealing with that. Inspector Pakul was locked in the door of Silver Hill, so he
was happy to be able to steal as much as he wanted. Hmmm... You never know what's going to happen in this world.

40262.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「うぐぐ……。パクレ:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>Ugggghh...Pakul is gone and I can't go
outside...my tragedy...too much God.... I've
learned to appreciate my waist. Seriously.

40263.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「うぐぐ……。オレの:
Ugh. My back is really bad! I really knocked down. Time to say goodbye has arrived. No kidding. I can't show her my pathetic
appearance like this. I can't let her see me like this. If I disappoint my only fan, I'm not only a thief, but I'm disqualified from
Pukulipo. Seriously.

40264.「じつは ダンダダ団には ファンがいるんだ。\n まあ ファンっていっても ひと:
Actually, Robbin' Ood Gang has a Fan. Well, only one Fan. She is a girl named Hanapoppa in Orphea. She's a little bit strange in many
ways. She loves Baro's Aniki. She used to get a kick out of watching him steal.

40265.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「パクレが出てきたか:
I can't steal because Pakul came out. I can't steal because Pakul came out. I mean, I haven't stolen yet because of my back pain.
I'm frustrated. And I ate all of Hanapoppa's food so that I wouldn't be disappointed just because I'm the only fan. I'm so depressed.
Seriously. I mean, God has given up on me too much. Seriously. My tragedy, I'm too godly until the very end.

40266.「あー。オイラ 腹へったなー。\n おいしいケーキとか いっぱい食べたいなー。\:
I'm hungry. I want to eat lots of delicious cakes. But now that Inspector Pakul has come out, I can't go to Orphea again. I guess I'd
better hold off.

40267.「やれやれ。どういうわけか\n パクレ警部が 銀の丘の扉から出てきたようだ。\n:
Oh dear. Somehow Inspector Pakul seems to have come out of the door at Silver Hill. I wonder who opened that door. I had a good time at
Muruel Forest, but I guess I'll have to be quiet for a while. I guess I'll have to stay quiet for a while.
